reviewText: Does not play on USA equipment not formatted. .Returning it cost me more than the DVD no return shipping label provided

So when I bought these I didn't realize they were a specific format, totally my fault. But I was able to watch them on my computer after downloading a specific adapter to be able to watch them. I give this three stars because I love the movies (they all deserve 5 stars) but the fact that the format is not an actual did format and it wasn't flat out mentioned when I invitially purchased them I'm giving them a three.
Cannot play these DVD on my Sony player.  Did not know the format for English DVD was different than America. Wasted my money
